Text.Page:
Heading into the Labyrinth? Step carefully. Some of the statues are traps.

I'm here on behalf of Kanmur, my...former...commander.

I've been in there on and off for days looking for the honorless, cowardly wretch who ripped out Kanmur's horns. A mad clown named Aleister. "I remember him."

Youâ€”you're ! Yes, I heard you were there when Aleister came to Kaiator.

I won't rest until we find and kill Aleister and the general's horns are where they belong.

Th-thank you.

An aman's body isn't whole without its horns.

The general can finally rest.

Have you found Aleister?

If you find him, he's yours, but once I've healed, I'm going inside to find that clown and rip him in two!
